author: Julie Steinberg
title: Tencent, Ctrip-Backed Travel Company Plans Hong Kong IPO
text:
Chinese internet giant Tencent Holdings Ltd. may soon have another opportunity to cash in on one of its investments.
Tongcheng-Elong Holdings Ltd., a travel company backed by Tencent and Chinaâ€™s largest travel website Ctrip.com International Ltd., is planning an initial public offering in Hong Kong in the second half of this year, according to people familiar with the matter. The Chinese company could raise between $1 billion and $1.5 billion in its share sale, one of the people said.
